description.originalText:
Roberta has been working with our family for 6+ months now caring for our son (who is now 13m) on a part-time basis.

Roberta has a calm, caring presence that immediately made my child feel at ease. Every day that the door opens and Roberta is here, he is over the moon to see her. She is very attentive and patient with our child and is actively engaged in helping him learn about the world. 

Roberta is a clear communicator, clean, and very respectful. I would recommend her without hesitation.

Roberta is wonderful with our 2 year old son. He is very energetic and curious and she embraces those qualities and can keep up with his energy levels whether they are playing indoors or out. From the start she was great at forming a connection with our son. Roberta is good at “reading a room” and finding how she fits into the family unit. She is intelligent, warm, reliable, caring, and punctual. We love having her around, and trust her caring for our kiddo. We highly recommend Roberta. She is an excellent caregiver, an extension of our family, and a friend!

Roberta is a gem! She is wonderful with our 2 year old son. He is a very active child and Roberta has the energy to keep up with him and let him explore his interests in a safe way. She is punctual, kindhearted, sincere, loving towards our kiddo, intelligent, and trustworthy. She was great connecting with him right away and has built a strong bond with him in the months she’s been with us. If you’re looking for a reliable caregiver who will fit nicely into your home dynamic Roberta has the ability to “read the room” and see how she fits into your environment best. I highly recommend Roberta, she feels like an extension of our family and a friend too!

description.displayText: We hired Roberta to watch our our 7 month old until he was just after 1. He absolutely adored her and his would face would light up when she walked in the door. She was Super caring toward our son and always thought of new activities to keep him entertained.
description.originalText: We hired Roberta to watch our our 7 month old until he was just after 1. He absolutely adored her and his would face would light up when she walked in the door. She was Super caring toward our son and always thought of new activities to keep him entertained.

description.displayText: My husband and I are medical doctors who have quite long hours and whose schedules vary from day to day. Our initial nanny had gotten into an accident quite suddenly. We found Roberta and she came in right away with very little orientation to our, at the time, 5 month old son. Upon meeting Roberta she immediately put me at ease. It is quite clear how comfortable Roberta is with working with young infants. I felt very comfortable leaving my son with her everyday. He had given us a lot of trouble with his naps. She rocks him to sleep everyday, sometimes for 45 minutes at a time. She has been very helpful in preparing homemade purred foods.  She is constantly either on the floor playing with him and his toys, reads to him, she loves singing and often sings to him. She has always been punctual, and has stayed late and come early on very little notice. Although she has only been with is for 3.5 months, she truly has been a wonderful addition to our family, our son will miss her dearly.
